titles.title: American Vehicle Security Act of 2023
American Vehicle Security Act of 2023
A bill to adjust the effective date for application of certain amendments made with respect to the credit for new clean vehicles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
American Vehicle Security Act of 2023
This bill requires the immediate implementation of amendments to the tax credit for new clean vehicles enacted by the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022. The amendments include requirements for vehicle assembly and critical mineral and battery sourcing for manufacturers.
